OOC: What a coincidence that Trinity doesn't like spiders, don't you think?=

nity. He is bright orange and hairy, and the scariest part was, that he was=
 an Orange Baboon Tarantula. The most aggressive of all Tarantulas. EVER! A=
nd there he was, staring, legs pushing him off the ground like a large cage=
, and looking at the 3 who had left the base...
